Blooming Heart.name: Blooming Heart
Blooming Heart.desc: On use, heals the user for 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Spawns 3 Healing Orbs which grant 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Orbs last 20s. Recasting removes previous Orbs

Broken Heart.name: Broken Heart
Broken Heart.desc: Innate 50% Use Speed Bonus. On use, sets current Health to 50% of max Health over 0.25s.

Constrained Heart.name: Constrained Heart
Constrained Heart.desc: On use regenerates 20 Health per second for 5s and grants 2 Stacks of Bulwark while heal is active.

Crystal Heart.name: Crystal Heart
Crystal Heart.desc: On use, regenerates 100% of Max Health over 10s, Movement Speed is reduced by 50%, and incoming damage is reduced by 25%. Lasts 10s.

Decayed Heart.name: Decayed Heart
Decayed Heart.desc: On use, causes the next 3 instances of enemy damage taken to trigger 40 Health regeneration over 3s. Lasts 30s.

Enlarged Heart.name: Enlarged Heart
Enlarged Heart.desc: Innate double use speed. On use, heals 140 health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is halved.

Lifeless Heart.name: Lifeless Heart
Lifeless Heart.desc: On use, heals 30 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is doubled

Paper Heart.name: Paper Heart
Paper Heart.desc: Heals up to 100% of current health over 0.25s. Gain 1 Stack/10% Health Restored. After 15s, remove 10% per Stack. Kills remove 1 Stack.

Pulsing Heart.name: Pulsing Heart
Pulsing Heart.desc: On use, pulses every 3s, healing allies within 7m for 20 Health over 0.5s per pulse. Lasts 15s.

Resonating Heart.name: Resonating Heart
Resonating Heart.desc: On use, regenerates 50% of Max Health over 5s. When heal ends, any overhealed Health is Doubled and awarded over the next 20s.
Resonating Heart.complex: How much OVERhealing are we going to 'pretend' you'll achieve in the 5sec window? Enter your best guess:

Ripened Heart.name: Ripened Heart
Ripened Heart.desc: On use, heals 35 Health over 0.5s and an additional 70 over 5s.

Runed Heart.name: Runed Heart
Runed Heart.desc: On use, increases Health Regeneration by 5 and generates 500 Mod Power over 10s.

Shielded Heart.name: Shielded Heart
Shielded Heart.desc: On use, grants a Shield for 100% of Max Health. Lasts 20s or until Shield is removed by damage

Siphon Heart.name: Siphon Heart
Siphon Heart.desc: On use, grants 10% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 15s.

Tranquil Heart.name: Tranquil Heart
Tranquil Heart.desc: Passively grants 2 Health Regeneration per second. On use, doubles All Health Regeneration for 15s.

Diverted Heart.name: Diverted Heart
Diverted Heart.desc: On use, reduces Skill Cooldowns by 1s for sec. Lasts 15s.

Quilted Heart.name: Quilted Heart
Quilted Heart.desc: Does not provide standard healing. On use, negates Stamina Drain and cause Evades to heal for 15 Health over 0.25s. Lasts 20s.

Reprocessed Heart.name: Reprocessed Heart
Reprocessed Heart.desc: On use, converts 5 Health to 40 Mod Power per second for 25s for Both Weapons. Cannot die from conversion.

Salvaged Heart.name: Salvaged Heart
Salvaged Heart.desc: Innate 50% Use Speed bonus. On use, heals 30 Health over 0.25s and restore 300% of current Grey Health.

Tormented Heart.name: Tormented Heart
Tormented Heart.desc: Innate 20% Relic Use Speed bonus. On use, deals 450 Explosive damage to enemies within 10m and Lifesteals 25% of damage dealt.

Unsullied Heart.name: Unsullied Heart
Unsullied Heart.desc: On use, heals for 100% of Current Health over 0.5s.

Void Heart.name: Void Heart
Void Heart.desc: On use, reduces incoming damage by 50% for 4s. When buff ends, heals 100% of missing Health over 0.75s.
